sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CATBBRAI( BRAI_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), BRAI_PART_NO VARCHAR(20), BRAI_EONO VARCHAR(20), BRAI_CUMT_NO NUMBER(10, 0), BRAI_WELD_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0), BRAI_KIND_GUBN VARCHAR(8), BRAI_KIND_CODE VARCHAR(8), BRAI_WLDR_GUBN VARCHAR(8), BRAI_WLDR_CODE VARCHAR(8), BRAI_ITEM_WDTH NUMBER(10, 2), BRAI_ITEM_HEGT NUMBER(10, 2), BRAI_WELD_THIK NUMBER(10, 2), BRAI_WELD_LENG NUMBER(10, 2), BRAI_PART_CNT0 NUMBER(10, 2), BRAI_INTN_LENG NUMBER(10, 2), BRAI_EXTN_LENG NUMBER(10, 2), BRAI_VANI_CAVT NUMBER(10, 2), BRAI_FOIL_QNTY NUMBER(10, 3), BRAI_LOSS_GUBN VARCHAR(8), BRAI_LOSS_RATE VARCHAR(8), BRAI_SCRP_WEGT NUMBER(10, 2), BRAI_SCRP_PRIC NUMBER(10, 2), BRAI_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), BRAI_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8), BRAI_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), BRAI_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8), CONSTRAINT CATBBRAI_PK PRIMARY KEY ( BRAI_CORP_CODE, BRAI_PART_NO, BRAI_EONO, BRAI_CUMT_NO, BRAI_WELD_SEQ0 ) )
